name: Spectral Form
description: You can enter a form where you can more easily access certain, metaphysical, powers.

badges.text: §6You can enter/exit a mode where §ncertain abilities become active or get enhanced§6, at the cost of §nincreased exhaustion§6 and §nother side effects§6.
§bYou have a food level greater than 30% in order to enter and stay in your spectral form.
